mapper.insert: INSERT INTO interview_question_analysis ( qa_q_idx, qa_total_score, qa_tech_score, qa_logic_score, qa_soft_score, qa_miss_keywords, qa_feedback_summary, qa_after_level, qa_create_at ) VALUES ( #{qaQIdx}, #{qaTotalScore}, #{qaTechScore}, #{qaLogicScore}, #{qaSoftScore}, #{qaMissKeywords}, #{qaFeedbackSummary}, #{qaAfterLevel}, #{qaCreateAt} )
mapper.select: SELECT qa.qa_idx, qa.qa_q_idx, qa.qa_total_score, qa.qa_tech_score, qa.qa_logic_score, qa.qa_soft_score, qa.qa_feedback_summary, qa.qa_create_at FROM interview_question_analysis qa JOIN interview_qna q ON qa.qa_q_idx = q.q_idx WHERE q.q_s_idx = #{sIdx} ORDER BY qa.qa_idx ASC
